articles.author: Robbie Savage
articles.title: Pep Guardiola must rest Haaland vs Everton to satisfy Man City owners' demands - The Mirror
articles.description: ROBBIE FOWLER: Man City have to make changes. They can afford to make 11 changes if Pep Guardiola seriously believes that will help against Real Madrid this week
articles.content:
Ive got to admit, a couple of weeks ago I thought Everton were down.
So to be writing in this column that I can see them going into a game against Manchester City with (an admittedly slim) chance of… [+4121 chars]

articles.title: The bottom 3 of the Premier League is SET! - Craig Burley on the EPL relegation battle | ESPN FC - ESPN UK
articles.description: The ESPN FC crew discusses the Premier League standings and discuss what teams they believe will be relegated.----Subscribe to ESPN UK: http://bit.ly/1oGUzVA...
